entry.title: 算法模板
entry.content:
第一章 基础算法

快读

手写快读

inline char Nowchar() {    static char buf[1 << 20], *p1 = buf, *p2 = buf;    bool flag = (p1 == p2) && (p2 = (p1 = buf) + fread(buf, 1, 1 << 20, stdin), p1 == p2);    return flag ? EOF : *p1++;}inline int Read() {    int x = 0, f = 1;    static char c = Nowchar();    for (; c > '9' || c < '0'; c = Nowchar()) {        if (c == '-') f = -1;    }    for (; c <= '9' && c >= '0'; c = Nowchar()) {        x = (x << 3) + (x << 1) + c - 48;    }    return x * f;}

__int128输入输出

inline char Nowchar() {    static char buf[1 << 20], *p1 = buf, *p2 = buf;    bool flag = (p1 == p2) && (p2 = (p1 = buf) + fread(buf, 1, 1 << 20, stdin), p1 == p2);    return flag ? EOF : *p1++;}inline __int128 Read() {    __int128 x = 0, f = 1;    static char c = Nowchar();    for (; c > '9' || c < '0'; c = Nowchar()) {        if (c == '-') f = -1;    }    for (; c <= '9' && c >= '0'; c = Nowchar()) {        x = (x << 3) + (x << 1) + c - 48;    }    return x * f;}inline void Print(__int128 x) {    if (x < 0) { putchar('-'); x = -x; }    if (x > 9) Print(x / 10);    putchar(x % 10 + '0');}

关闭流同步

#include <iostream>using namespace std;int main() {    ios::sync_with_stdio(0);    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);    return 0;}

排序

快速排序

AcWing785.快速排序

手写快速排序

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5;int a[N];void quick_sort(int a[], int l, int r) {    if (l >= r) return;    int i = l - 1, j = r + 1, x = a[i + j >> 1];    while (i < j) {        do i++; while(a[i] < x);        do j--; while(a[j] > x);        if (i < j) swap(a[i], a[j]);    }    quick_sort(a, l, j);    quick_sort(a, j + 1, r);}int main() {    int n;    cin >> n;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) cin >> a[i];    quick_sort(a, 0, n - 1);    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cout << a[i] << " ";    return 0;}

归并排序

AcWing787.归并排序

使用归并排序将数组按从小到大排序

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5;int a[N], b[N];void merge_sort(int l, int r) {    if (l >= r) return;    int mid = l + r >> 1;    merge_sort(l, mid), merge_sort(mid + 1, r);    int i = l, j = mid + 1;    for (int k = l; k <= r; k++) {        if (j > r || i <= mid && a[i] <= a[j]) b[k] = a[i++];        else b[k] = a[j++];    }    for (int k = l; k <= r; k++) a[k] = b[k];}int main() {    int n;    cin >> n;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];    merge_sort(0, n - 1);    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cout << a[i] << " ";    return 0;}

二分

整数二分

AcWing789.数的范围

在一个有序数列中找到大于等于x的第一个数和最后一个数

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5;int a[N];int main() {    int n, q, k;    cin >> n >> q;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];    while (q--) {        cin >> k;        int l = 0, r = n - 1;        while (l < r) {            int mid = l + r >> 1;            if (a[mid] >= k) r = mid;            else l = mid + 1;        }        if (a[r] != k) {            cout << -1 << " " << -1 << endl;            continue;        } else cout << r << " ";        l = 0, r = n - 1;        while (l < r) {            int mid = l + r + 1 >> 1;            if (a[mid] <= k) l = mid;            else r = mid - 1;        }        cout << r << endl;    }    return 0;}

浮点数二分

AcWing790.数的三次方根

二分答案

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const double eps = 1e-7;double pow(double x) {    return x * x * x;}int main() {    double n;    cin >> n;    double l = -1e4, r = 1e4;    while (r - l > eps) {        double mid = (l + r) / 2;        if (pow(mid) > n) r = mid;        else l = mid;    }    printf("%.6lf\n", r);    return 0;}

高精度

高精度加法

AcWing791.高精度加法

大整数+大整数

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;vector<int> add(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    if (A.size() < B.size()) return add(B, A);    vector<int> C;    int t = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {        t += A[i];        if (i < B.size()) t += B[i];        C.push_back(t % 10);        t /= 10;    }    if (t) C.push_back(t);    return C;}int main() {    string a, b;    cin >> a >> b;    vector<int> A, B;    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) B.push_back(b[i] - '0');    vector<int> C = add(A, B);    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];    return 0;}

高精度减法

AcWing792.高精度减法

大整数-大整数

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;bool cmp(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    if (A.size() != B.size()) return A.size() > B.size();    for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        if (A[i] != B[i]) return A[i] > B[i];    }    return true;}vector<int> sub(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    vector<int> C;    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {        t = A[i] - t;        if (i < B.size()) t -= B[i];        C.push_back((t + 10) % 10);        if (t < 0) t = 1;        else t = 0;    }    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();    return C;}int main() {    string a, b;    cin >> a >> b;    vector<int> A, B;    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) B.push_back(b[i] - '0');    vector<int> C;    if (cmp(A, B)) C = sub(A, B);    else C = sub(B, A), cout << '-';    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];    return 0;}

高精度乘法

AcWing793.高精度乘法

高精度*低精度

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;vector<int> mul(vector<int> A, int b) {    vector<int> C;    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < A.size() || t; i++) {        if (i < A.size()) t += A[i] * b;        C.push_back(t % 10);        t /= 10;    }    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();    return C;}int main() {    string a;    int b;    vector<int> A;    cin >> a >> b;    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');    vector<int> C = mul(A, b);    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];    return 0;}

AcWing793.高精度乘法

高精度*高精度

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;vector<int> mul(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    vector<int> C(A.size() + B.size(), 0);    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {        for (int j = 0; j < B.size(); j++) {            C[i + j] += A[i] * B[j];        }    }    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < C.size(); i++) {        t += C[i];        C[i] = t % 10;        t /= 10;    }    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();    return C;}int main() {    string a, b;    cin >> a >> b;    vector<int> A, B;    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) B.push_back(b[i] - '0');    vector<int> C = mul(A, B);    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];    return 0;}

高精度除法

AcWing794.高精度除法

高精度/低精度

#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;vector<int> div(vector<int> &A, int b, int &r) {    vector<int> C;    r = 0;    for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        r = r * 10 + A[i];        C.push_back(r / b);        r %= b;    }    reverse(C.begin(), C.end());    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();    return C;}int main() {    string a;    int B;    vector<int> A;    cin >> a >> B;    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');    int r;    vector<int> C = div(A, B, r);    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];    cout << endl << r << endl;    return 0;}

高精度加法状态压缩

AcWing791.高精度加法

高精度+高精度，状态压缩提高速度

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;const int base = 100000000;vector<int> add(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    if (A.size() < B.size()) return add(B, A);    vector<int> C;    int t = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {        t += A[i];        if (i < B.size()) t += B[i];        C.push_back(t % base);        t /= base;    }    if (t) C.push_back(t);    return C;}int main() {    string a, b;    cin >> a >> b;    vector<int> A, B;    int j = 0, s = 0, t = 1;    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        s += (a[i] - '0') * t;        j++, t *= 10;        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {            A.push_back(s);            s = j = 0;            t = 1;        }    }    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        s += (b[i] - '0') * t;        j++, t *= 10;        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {            B.push_back(s);            s = j = 0;            t = 1;        }    }    vector<int> C = add(A, B);    cout << C.back();    for (int i = C.size() - 2; i >= 0; i--) printf("%08d", C[i]);    return 0;}

高精度减法状态压缩

AcWing792.高精度减法

高精度-高精度，状态压缩提高速度

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;const int base = 100000000;bool cmp(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    if (A.size() != B.size()) return A.size() > B.size();    for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        if (A[i] != B[i]) return A[i] > B[i];    }    return true;}vector<int> sub(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    vector<int> C;    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {        t = A[i] - t;        if (i < B.size()) t -= B[i];        C.push_back((t + base) % base);        if (t < 0) t = 1;        else t = 0;    }    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();    return C;}int main() {    string a, b;    cin >> a >> b;    vector<int> A, B;    int j = 0, s = 0, t = 1;    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        s += (a[i] - '0') * t;        j++, t *= 10;        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {            A.push_back(s);            s = j = 0;            t = 1;        }    }    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        s += (b[i] - '0') * t;        j++, t *= 10;        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {            B.push_back(s);            s = j = 0;            t = 1;        }    }    vector<int> C;    if (cmp(A, B)) C = sub(A, B);    else C = sub(B, A), cout << '-';    cout << C.back();    for (int i = C.size() - 2; i >= 0; i--) printf("%08d", C[i]);    return 0;}

高精度乘法状态压缩

AcWing793.高精度乘法

高精度*高精度，状态压缩提高速度

#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;#define int long long const int base = 100000000;vector<int> mul(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {    vector<int> C(A.size() + B.size(), 0);    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {        for (int j = 0; j < B.size(); j++) {            C[i + j] += A[i] * B[j];        }    }    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < C.size(); i++) {        t += C[i];        C[i] = t % base;        t /= base;    }    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();    return C;}signed main() {    string a, b;    cin >> a >> b;    vector<int> A, B;    int j = 0, s = 0, t = 1;    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        s += (a[i] - '0') * t;        j++, t *= 10;        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {            A.push_back(s);            s = j = 0;            t = 1;        }    }    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {        s += (b[i] - '0') * t;        j++, t *= 10;        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {            B.push_back(s);            s = j = 0;            t = 1;        }    }    vector<int> C = mul(A, B);    cout << C.back();    for (int i = C.size() - 2; i >= 0; i--) printf("%08lld", C[i]);    return 0;}

前缀和与差分

一维前缀和

AcWing795.前缀和

求序列任意区间的和

#include <iostream>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int N = 1e5 + 5;int a[N], sum[N];signed main() {    int n, m;    cin >> n >> m;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + a[i];    while (m--) {        int l, r;        cin >> l >> r;        cout << sum[r] - sum[l - 1] << endl;    }    return 0;}

二维前缀和

AcWing796.子矩阵的和

求矩阵任意子矩阵的和

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1005;int a[N][N], sum[N][N];int main() {    int n, m, q;    cin >> n >> m >> q;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) cin >> a[i][j];    }    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {            sum[i][j] = sum[i - 1][j] + sum[i][j - 1] - sum[i - 1][j - 1] + a[i][j];        }    }    while (q--) {        int x1, y1, x2, y2;        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;        cout << sum[x2][y2] - sum[x1 - 1][y2] - sum[x2][y1 - 1] + sum[x1 - 1][y1 - 1] << endl;    }    return 0;}

一维差分

AcWing797.差分

维护序列区间加
询问序列区间和

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5;int a[N], b[N], sum[N];void insert(int l, int r, int c) {    b[l] += c;    b[r + 1] -= c;}int main() {    int n, m;    cin >> n >> m;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) b[i] = a[i] - a[i - 1];    while (m--) {        int l, r, c;        cin >> l >> r >> c;        insert(l, r, c);    }    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + b[i];    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cout << sum[i] << " ";    return 0;}

二维差分

AcWing798.差分矩阵

维护矩阵子矩阵加
询问矩阵子矩阵和

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1005;int a[N][N], b[N][N], sum[N][N];void insert(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int c) {    b[x1][y1] += c;    b[x2 + 1][y1] -= c;    b[x1][y2 + 1] -= c;    b[x2 + 1][y2 + 1] += c;}int main() {    int n, m, q;    cin >> n >> m >> q;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) cin >> a[i][j];    }    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {            insert(i, j, i, j, a[i][j]);        }    }    while (q--) {        int x1, y1, x2, y2, c;        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2 >> c;        insert(x1, y1, x2, y2, c);    }    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {            sum[i][j] = sum[i - 1][j] + sum[i][j - 1] - sum[i - 1][j - 1] + b[i][j];         }    }    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {            cout << sum[i][j] << " ";        }        cout << endl;    }    return 0;}

离散化

AcWing802.区间和

数的范围太大，不能作为数组的下标
数的个数较小，能作为数组的下标
讲数映射为数组下标，通过数组下标找的原来的数，从而实现离散化

#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 300010;typedef pair<int, int> pii;#define fi first#define se secondvector<int> v;vector<pii> add, query;int a[N];int find(int x) {    return lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), x) - v.begin() + 1; }int main() {    int n, m;    cin >> n >> m;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        int x, c;        cin >> x >> c;        add.push_back({x, c});        v.push_back(x);    }    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int l, r;        cin >> l >> r;        query.push_back({l, r});        v.push_back(l);        v.push_back(r);    }    sort(v.begin(), v.end());    v.erase(unique(v.begin(), v.end()), v.end());    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        int j = find(add[i].fi);        a[j] += add[i].se;    }    for (int i = 1; i <= v.size(); i++) {        a[i] += a[i - 1];    }    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int l = find(query[i].fi);        int r = find(query[i].se);        cout << a[r] - a[l - 1] << endl;    }    return 0;}

模拟

麻将算法

2021ICPC昆明K.Riichi!!

模拟打麻将，丢掉什么牌在摸到什么牌后能赢
暴力枚举对子来判断牌是否是赢的状态
暴力枚举丢的牌和摸的牌

#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <unordered_map>#include <cstring>using namespace std;typedef pair<int, int> pii;int a[5][10];unordered_map<char, int> ctn;char s[30];bool check() {    for (int i = 1; i <= 3; i++) {        int A = 0, B = 0;        for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {            int temp = a[i][j] - A - B;            if (temp < 0) return false;            temp %= 3;            B = A, A = temp;         }        if (A + B != 0) return false;     }    for (int j = 1; j <= 8; j++) {        if (a[4][j] && a[4][j] % 3) return false;    }    return true;}bool judge() {    for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {        int sum = 0;        for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) sum += a[i][j];        if (sum % 3 != 2) continue;        for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {            if (a[i][j] < 2) continue;            a[i][j] -= 2;            bool flag = check();            a[i][j] += 2;            if (flag) return true;        }    }    return false;}void oper(vector<pii> &ans, int x, int y) {    a[x][y]--;    for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {            a[i][j]++;            if (judge()) ans.push_back({i, j});            a[i][j]--;        }    }    a[x][y]++;}void opt(int x, int y) {    static int ntc[] = {' ', 'w', 'b', 's', 'z'};    printf("%d%c", y, ntc[x]);}int main() {    ctn['w'] = 1; ctn['b'] = 2;    ctn['s'] = 3; ctn['z'] = 4;    int T;    scanf("%d", &T);    while (T--) {        scanf("%s", s + 1);        memset(a, 0, sizeof a);        for (int i = 1; i <= 28; i += 2) a[ctn[s[i + 1]]][s[i] - '0']++;                if (judge()) puts("Tsumo!");        else {            vector<pii> ans[5][10];            for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {                for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {                    if (a[i][j]) oper(ans[i][j], i, j);                }            }            int res = 0;            for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {                for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {                    if (ans[i][j].size()) res++;                }            }            printf("%d\n", res);            for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {                for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {                    if (ans[i][j].size()) {                        opt(i, j);                        printf(" ");                        for (auto it : ans[i][j]) opt(it.first, it.second);                        puts("");                     }                }             }        }    }    return 0;}

搜索

启发式搜索

A*

AcWing179. 八数码

估值函数是当前状态和目标状态的曼哈顿距离

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>#include <functional>#include <algorithm>#include <unordered_map>#include <queue>using namespace std;#define piss pair<int, pair<string, string>>#define x first#define y secondint main() {    string ss, start;    while (getline(cin, ss)) {        for (int i = 0; i < 17; i += 2) start += ss[i];        int cnt = 0;        for (int i = 0; i < 9; i++) {            if (start[i] == 'x') continue;            for (int j = i + 1; j < 9; j++) {                if (start[j] == 'x') continue;                if (start[i] > start[j]) cnt++;            }        }        if (cnt & 1) puts("unsolvable");        else {            auto f = [&](string state) {                int res = 0;                for (int i = 0; i < state.size(); i++) {                    if (state[i] == 'x') continue;                    int t = state[i] - '1';                    res += abs(i / 3 - t / 3) + abs(i % 3 - t % 3);                }                return res;            };            auto bfs = [&](string start) {                string end = "12345678x";                int dx[4] = {-1, 1, 0, 0};                int dy[4] = {0, 0, -1, 1};                string s = "udlr";                unordered_map<string, int> d;                priority_queue<piss, vector<piss>, greater<piss>> q;                d[start] = 0;                q.push({f(start), {start, ""}});                while (q.size()) {                    piss u = q.top(); q.pop();                    string from = u.y.x, to = from;                    if (from == end) return u.y.y;                    int p = from.find('x');                    for (int i = 0; i < 4; i++) {                        int tx = p / 3 + dx[i];                        int ty = p % 3 + dy[i];                        if (tx >= 0 && tx < 3 && ty >= 0 && ty < 3) {                            to = from;                            swap(to[p], to[tx * 3 + ty]);                            if (!d.count(to) || d[to] > d[from] + 1) {                                d[to] = d[from] + 1;                                q.push({d[to] + f(to), {to, u.y.y + s[i]}});                            }                        }                    }                }            };            cout <<    bfs(start) << endl;        }    }    return 0;}

第二章 动态规划

区间DP

区间染色模型

2021ICPC昆明站C.Cities

一个颜色序列，要求把他染成同一种颜色，每次只能染连续相同的颜色为另一种颜色，求最小染色次数、
定义f[i][j]表示将区间[i, j]染成同一种颜色的所有方案中染色次数最小的方案的染色次数。
状态转移：f[i][j] = min(f[i][j - 1] + 1, f[i][k] + f[k + 1][j]) k为与a[j]颜色相同的位置 

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 5e3 + 5;int a[N], pre[N], lst[N], f[N][N];int main() {    int T;    scanf("%d", &T);    while (T--) {        int n;        scanf("%d", &n);        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {            scanf("%d", &a[i]);            if (a[i] == a[i - 1]) {                i--, n--;                continue;            }            lst[a[i]] = 0;        }        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {            pre[i] = lst[a[i]];            lst[a[i]] = i;        }        memset(f, 0, sizeof f);        for (int len = 2; len <= n; len++) {            for (int i = 1; i + len - 1 <= n; i++) {                int j = i + len - 1;                f[i][j] = f[i][j - 1] + 1;                for (int k = pre[j]; k >= i; k = pre[k]) {                    f[i][j] = min(f[i][j], f[i][k] + f[k + 1][j]);                }            }        }         printf("%d\n", f[1][n]);    }    return 0;}

状压DP

Codeforce 11 D.A Simple Task

用状态压缩DP计算无向图简单环的数量
用二进制来表示所有集合，通过将状态压缩为整数来达到优化转移的目的。

#include <iostream>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int N = 19;int g[N + 5][N + 5];int f[(1 << N) + 5][N + 5];int n, m;int lowbit(int x) {    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        if(x & (1 << i)) return i;    }    return -1;}signed main() {    int ans = 0;    scanf("%lld%lld", &n, &m);    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int u, v;        scanf("%lld%lld", &u, &v);        u--, v--;        g[u][v] = g[v][u] = 1;    }    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) f[1 << i][i] = 1;    for (int S = 1; S < (1 << n); S++) {        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {             if (!f[S][i]) continue;            int p = lowbit(S);            for (int j = p; j < n; j++) {                if (!g[i][j]) continue;                if (S & (1 << j)) {                    if (j == p) ans += f[S][i];                } else f[S | (1 << j)][j] += f[S][i];            }        }    }    ans = (ans - m) / 2;    printf("%lld\n", ans);    return 0;}

#include <iostream>#include <cstdio>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 6e3 + 5;int h[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;bool st[N], vis[N];int f[N][2];void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}void dfs(int u) {    vis[u] = 1;    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int j = e[i];        if (vis[j]) continue;        dfs(j);        f[u][1] += f[j][0];        f[u][0] += max(f[j][0], f[j][1]);    }}int main() {    int n;    scanf("%d", &n);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &f[i][1]);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {        int a, b;        scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);        add(b, a);        st[a] = 1;    }    int res = 0;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        if (!st[i]) {            dfs(i);            res = max(f[i][0], f[i][1]);            break;        }    }    printf("%d\n", res);    return 0;}

#include <iostream>#include <cstdio>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 305;int h[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;int f[N][N];int n, m;void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}int dfs(int u) {    int p = 1;    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int v = e[i];        int sz = dfs(v);        for (int j = min(p, m + 1); j; j--) {            for (int k = 1; k <= sz && k + j <= m + 1; k++) {                f[u][k + j] = max(f[u][k + j], f[u][j] + f[v][k]);            }        }        p += sz;    }    return p;}int main() {    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        int k;        scanf("%d%d", &k, &f[i][1]);        add(k, i);    }    dfs(0);    printf("%d\n", f[0][m + 1]);    return 0;}

换根DP

洛谷P3478 [POI2008]STA-Station

给定一个n个点的树，请求出一个结点，使得以这个结点为根时，所有结点的深度之和最大。
一个结点的深度之定义为该节点到根的简单路径上边的数量。

#include <iostream>#include <cstdio>#include <cstring>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int N = 1e6 + 5, M = N * 2;int h[N], e[M], ne[M], idx;int sz[N], d[N];int f[N];int n;void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++; }int dfs1(int u, int fa) {    sz[u] = 1;    d[u] = d[fa] + 1;    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int j = e[i];        if (j == fa) continue;        sz[u] += dfs1(j, u);    }    return sz[u];}void dfs2(int u, int fa) {    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int j = e[i];        if (j == fa) continue;        f[j] = f[u] - sz[j] * 2 + n;        dfs2(j, u);    }}signed main() {    scanf("%lld", &n);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {        int a, b;        scanf("%lld%lld", &a, &b);        add(a, b), add(b, a);    }    dfs1(1, 1);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) f[1] += d[i];    dfs2(1, 1);    int sum = f[1], res = 1;    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {        if (f[i] > sum) {            sum = f[i];            res = i;        }    }    printf("%lld\n", res);    return 0;}

单调栈

洛谷P1950 长方形

单调栈可以在O(n)的时间内求出一个数左/右边比他小/大的第一个数

#include <iostream>#include <stack>using namespace std;const int N = 1005;int n, m;int a[N][N];int l[N], r[N], h[N];long long ans;void workl() {    stack<int> stk;    for (int i = m; i >= 1; i--) {        while (stk.size() && h[i] <= h[stk.top()]) {            l[stk.top()] = i;            stk.pop();        }        stk.push(i);    }    while (stk.size()) {        l[stk.top()] = 0;        stk.pop();    }}void workr() {    stack<int> stk;    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {        while (stk.size() && h[i] < h[stk.top()]) {            r[stk.top()] = i;            stk.pop();        }        stk.push(i);    }    while (stk.size()) {        r[stk.top()] = m + 1;        stk.pop();    }}void work() {    workl();    workr();    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {        ans += (i - l[i]) * (r[i] - i) * h[i];    }}int main() {    char c;    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {            cin >> c;            if (c == '*') a[i][j] = 1;        }    }    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {            h[j]++;            if (a[i][j]) h[j] = 0;        }        work();    }    printf("%lld\n", ans);    return 0;}

const int N = 60;int pre[N], in[N];int v[N], lc[N], rc[N], idx;int reduce(int ps, int is, int ie) {    int u = pre[ps];    v[++idx] = u;    int id = idx, k = 0;    for (int i = is; i <= ie; i++) {        if (in[i] == u) break;        k++;    }    if (k == ie - is + 1) return 0;    if (k != 0) lc[id] = reduce(ps + 1, is, is + k - 1);    if (k != ie - is) rc[id] = reduce(ps + k + 1, is + k + 1, ie);    return id;}

给后序和中序建二叉树

团体程序设计天梯赛-练习集 L2-006 树的遍历

const int N = 60;int in[N], post[N];int v[N], lc[N], rc[N], idx;int reduce(int ps, int pe, int is, int ie) {    int u = post[pe];    v[++idx] = u;    int id = idx, k = 0;    for (int i = is; i <= ie; i++) {        if (in[i] == u) break;        k++;    }    if (k == ie - is + 1) return 0;    if (k != 0) lc[id] = reduce(ps, ps + k - 1, is, is + k - 1);    if (k != ie - is) rc[id] = reduce(ps + k, pe - 1, is + k + 1, ie);    return id;}

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5, M = 31 * N;int son[M][2], idx;void insert(int x) {    int p = 0;     for (int i = 30; i >= 0; i--) {        int u = x >> i & 1;        if (!son[p][u]) son[p][u] = ++idx;        p = son[p][u];    }}int search(int x) {    int p = 0, res = 0;    for (int i = 30; i >= 0; i--) {        int u = x >> i & 1;        if (son[p][!u]) {            res = res * 2 + !u;            p = son[p][!u];        } else {            res = res * 2 + u;            p = son[p][u];        }    }    return res;}int main() {    int n;    cin >> n;    int res = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        int a;        cin >> a;        insert(a);        int t = search(a);        res = max(res, a ^ t);    }    cout << res << endl;    return 0;}

#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 3e7;char s[N], S[N];int main() {    cin >> s;    int n = strlen(s);    int j = 0;    S[j++] = '#';    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        S[j++] = '#', S[j++] = s[i];    }    S[j] = '#';    n = strlen(S);    int res = 0;    vector<int> d(n);    for (int i = 0, l = 0, r = -1; i < n; i++) {        int k = i > r ? 1 : min(d[l + r - i], r - i);        while (i - k >= 0 && i + k < n && S[i - k] == S[i + k]) k++;        d[i] = k--;        if (i + k > r) { l = i - k, r = i + k; }        int len = d[i] * 2 - (S[i] != '#');        res = max(res, (len - 1) / 2);    }    cout << res << endl;    return 0;}

AcWing839.模拟堆

手写小根堆

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 100010;int h[N], ph[N], hp[N], idx;void heap_swap(int a, int b) {    swap(h[a], h[b]);    swap(ph[hp[a]], ph[hp[b]]);    swap(hp[a], hp[b]);}void down(int u) {    int t = u;    if (u * 2 <= idx && h[u * 2] < h[t]) t = u * 2;    if (u * 2 + 1 <= idx && h[u * 2 + 1] < h[t]) t = u * 2 + 1;    if (u != t) {        heap_swap(u, t);        down(t);    }} void up(int u) {    while (u / 2 && h[u] < h[u / 2]) {        heap_swap(u, u / 2);        u /= 2;    }} int main() {    int n;    cin >> n;    int m = 0;    while (n--) {        string op;        int x, k;        cin >> op;        if (op == "I") {            cin >> x;            idx++, m++;            h[idx] = x;            ph[m] = idx, hp[idx] = m;            up(idx);        } else if (op == "PM") {            cout << h[1] << endl;        } else if (op == "DM") {            heap_swap(1, idx);            idx--;            down(1);        } else if (op == "D") {            cin >> k;            k = ph[k];            heap_swap(k, idx);            idx--;            down(k), up(k);        } else {            cin >> k >> x;            k = ph[k];            h[k] = x;            down(k), up(k);        }     }    return 0;}

#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>#include <functional>using namespace std;const int N = 1e6 + 5;struct Node {    int l, r, id;}p[N];int main() {    int n;    scanf("%d", &n);    vector<int> a(n + 1);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &a[i]);    int m;    scanf("%d", &m);     for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {        int l, r;        scanf("%d%d", &l, &r);        p[i] = {l, r, i};    }    sort(p + 1, p + m + 1, [&](const Node &x, const Node &y) {        return x.r < y.r;    });    vector<int> tr(N);    auto add = [&](int x, int d) {        for (x; x < N; x += x & -x) tr[x] += d;        };    auto sum = [&](int x) {        int res = 0;        for (x; x; x -= x & -x) res += tr[x];        return res;    };    vector<int> lst(N);    vector<int> ans(m + 1);     for (int i = 1, j = 1; i <= n; i++) {        if (lst[a[i]]) add(lst[a[i]], -1);        lst[a[i]] = i;        add(i, 1);        while (i == p[j].r) {            ans[p[j].id] = sum(p[j].r) - sum(p[j].l - 1);            j++;        }    }    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) printf("%d\n", ans[i]);    return 0;    }

洛谷P3372 【模板】线段树1

维护序列区间加
询问序列区间和 

#include <iostream>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int N = 1e5 + 5;struct Node {    int l, r;    int sum;    int add;}tr[N * 4];int a[N];void pushup(int u) {    tr[u].sum = tr[u << 1].sum + tr[u << 1 | 1].sum;}void pushdown(int u) {    Node &rt = tr[u], &lc = tr[u << 1], &rc = tr[u << 1 | 1];    if (rt.add == 0) return;    lc.add += rt.add;    lc.sum += (lc.r - lc.l + 1) * rt.add;    rc.add += rt.add;    rc.sum += (rc.r - rc.l + 1) * rt.add;    rt.add = 0;}void build(int u, int l, int r) {    if (l == r) tr[u] = {l, r, a[r], 0};    else {        tr[u] = {l, r};        int mid = l + r >> 1;        build(u << 1, l, mid);        build(u << 1 | 1, mid + 1, r);        pushup(u);    }}void modify(int u, int l, int r, int k) {    if (tr[u].l > r || tr[u].r < l) return;    else if (tr[u].l >= l && tr[u].r <= r) {        tr[u].add += k;        tr[u].sum += (tr[u].r - tr[u].l + 1) * k;    } else {        pushdown(u);        modify(u << 1, l, r, k);        modify(u << 1 | 1, l, r, k);        pushup(u);    }}int query_sum(int u, int l, int r) {    if (tr[u].l > r || tr[u].r < l) return 0;    if (tr[u].l >= l && tr[u].r <= r) return tr[u].sum;    pushdown(u);    return query_sum(u << 1, l, r) + query_sum(u << 1 | 1, l, r);}signed main() {    int n, m;    cin >> n >> m;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];    build(1, 1, n);    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int op, l, r;        cin >> op >> l >> r;        if (op == 1) {            int k;            cin >> k;            modify(1, l, r, k);        } else {            cout << query_sum(1, l, r) << endl;        }    }    return 0;}

维护序列区间加
询问序列区间和 

#include <iostream>using namespace std;#define int long longconst int N = 1e5 + 5;struct Node {    int l, r;    int sum;    int add, mul;}tr[N * 4];int a[N];int p;void pushup(int u) {    tr[u].sum = (tr[u << 1].sum + tr[u << 1 | 1].sum) % p;}void update(int u, int add, int mul) {    Node &rt = tr[u];    rt.sum = (rt.sum * mul + (rt.r - rt.l + 1) * add) % p;    rt.add = (rt.add * mul + add) % p;    rt.mul = rt.mul * mul % p;}void pushdown(int u) {    Node &rt = tr[u];    if (rt.add == 0 && rt.mul == 1) return;    update(u << 1, rt.add, rt.mul);    update(u << 1 | 1, rt.add, rt.mul);    rt.add = 0, rt.mul = 1;}void build(int u, int l, int r) {    if (l == r) tr[u] = {l, r, a[r], 0, 1};    else {        tr[u] = {l, r, 0, 0, 1};        int mid = l + r >> 1;        build(u << 1, l, mid);        build(u << 1 | 1, mid + 1, r);        pushup(u);    }}void modify(int u, int l, int r, int add, int mul) {    if (tr[u].l > r || tr[u].r < l) return;    else if (tr[u].l >= l && tr[u].r <= r) {        update(u, add, mul);    } else {        pushdown(u);        modify(u << 1, l, r, add, mul);        modify(u << 1 | 1, l, r, add, mul);        pushup(u);    }}int query_sum(int u, int l, int r) {    if (tr[u].l > r || tr[u].r < l) return 0;    if (tr[u].l >= l && tr[u].r <= r) return tr[u].sum;    pushdown(u);    return (query_sum(u << 1, l, r) + query_sum(u << 1 | 1, l, r)) % p;}signed main() {    int n, m;    cin >> n >> m >> p;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];    build(1, 1, n);    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int op, l, r, k;        cin >> op >> l >> r;        if (op == 1) {            cin >> k;            modify(1, l, r, 0, k);        } else if (op == 2) {            cin >> k;            modify(1, l, r, k, 1);        } else {            cout << query_sum(1, l, r) << endl;        }    }    return 0;}

洛谷P1908 逆序对

桶的线段树写法
统计区间数的个数

#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 5e5 + 5;int a[N];vector<int> v;struct Node {    int l, r;    int cnt;}tr[N * 4];void pushup(int u) {    tr[u].cnt = tr[u << 1].cnt + tr[u << 1 | 1].cnt;}void build(int u, int l, int r) {    tr[u] = {l, r, 0};    if (l == r) return;    int mid = l + r >> 1;    build(u << 1, l, mid);    build(u << 1 | 1, mid + 1, r);    pushup(u);}void modify(int u, int x) {    if (tr[u].l > x || tr[u].r < x) return;    tr[u].cnt++;    if (tr[u].l == tr[u].r) return;    modify(u << 1, x);    modify(u << 1 | 1, x);    pushup(u);}int query_cnt(int u, int l, int r) {    if (tr[u].l > r || tr[u].r < l) return 0;    if (tr[u].l >= l && tr[u].r <= r) return tr[u].cnt;    return query_cnt(u << 1, l, r) + query_cnt(u << 1 | 1, l, r);}int find(int x) {    return lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), x) - v.begin() + 1;}int main() {    int n;    scanf("%d", &n);    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        scanf("%d", &a[i]);        v.push_back(a[i]);    }    sort(v.begin(), v.end());    v.erase(unique(v.begin(), v.end()), v.end());    build(1, 1, v.size());    long long res = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        int x = find(a[i]);        if (x != v.size()) res += query_cnt(1, x + 1, v.size());        modify(1, x);    }    printf("%lld\n", res);    return 0;}

线段树动态开点

洛谷U74894 有便便的厕所

动态申请空间

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5;const int INF = 1e9 + 5;struct Node {    int lc, rc, l, r, cnt, del;}tr[N * 50];int rt, idx;void pushup(int u) {    int lc = tr[u].lc, rc = tr[u].rc;    tr[u].cnt = tr[lc].cnt + tr[rc].cnt;}void update(int u) {    tr[u].del = 1;    tr[u].cnt = 0;}void pushdown(int u) {    if (!tr[u].del) return;    update(tr[u].lc), update(tr[u].rc);    tr[u].del = 0;}void insert(int &u, int l, int r, int x) {    if (!u) u = ++idx;    tr[u].l = l, tr[u].r = r;    if (l == r) {        tr[u].del = 0;        tr[u].cnt++;        return;    }    pushdown(u);    int mid = l + r >> 1;    if (x <= mid) insert(tr[u].lc, l, mid, x);    else insert(tr[u].rc, mid + 1, r, x);    pushup(u);}void modify(int u, int l, int r) {    if (!u || tr[u].del || !tr[u].cnt) return;    if (tr[u].l > r || tr[u].r < l) return;    if (tr[u].l >= l && tr[u].r <= r) {        update(u);        return;    }    pushdown(u);    modify(tr[u].lc, l, r);    modify(tr[u].rc, l, r);    pushup(u);}int query_sum(int u, int l, int r) {    if (!u || tr[u].del || !tr[u].cnt) return 0;    if (tr[u].l > r || tr[u].r < l) return 0;    if (tr[u].l >=l && tr[u].r <= r) return tr[u].cnt;    return query_sum(tr[u].lc, l, r) + query_sum(tr[u].rc, l, r);}int query_kth(int u, int l, int r, int k) {    if (!u || tr[u].del || !tr[u].cnt) return -1;    if (tr[u].l == tr[u].r) return tr[u].cnt >= k ? tr[u].r : -1;    pushdown(u);    int mid = tr[u].l + tr[u].r >> 1;    int res = 0;    if (r > mid) {        res = query_sum(tr[u].rc, l, r);        if (res >= k) return query_kth(tr[u].rc, l, r, k);    }    if (l <= mid) return query_kth(tr[u].lc, l, r, k - res);    return -1;}int main() {    int n;    scanf("%d", &n);    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        int op, l, r, x, k;        scanf("%d", &op);        if (op == 1) {            scanf("%d", &x);            insert(rt, 1, INF, x);        } else if (op == 2) {            scanf("%d%d", &l, &r);            modify(1, l, r);        } else {            scanf("%d%d%d", &l, &r, &k);            printf("%d\n", query_kth(1, l, r, k));        }    }    return 0;}

线段树解决树上问题

CF1192 B.Dynamic Diameter

对一棵带权无向树，动态维护树的直径。

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;#define int long long const int N = 1e5 + 5;const int inf = -1e18;int h[N], e[N * 2], ne[N * 2], w[N * 2], idx = 1;int d[N], f[N], weight[N], fi[N], la[N], which[N * 2], tot;struct Node {    int l, r;    int val, M, LM, MR, LMR;    int add; }tr[N * 8];void pushup(int u) {    Node &rt = tr[u], &lc = tr[u << 1], &rc = tr[u << 1 | 1];    rt.val = max(lc.val, rc.val);    rt.M = max(lc.M, rc.M);    rt.LM = max(max(lc.LM, rc.LM), lc.val + rc.M);    rt.MR = max(max(lc.MR, rc.MR), lc.M + rc.val);    rt.LMR = max(max(lc.LMR, rc.LMR), max(lc.LM + rc.val, lc.val + rc.MR)); }void pushdown(int u) {    if (tr[u].add == 0) return;    Node &rt = tr[u], &lc = tr[u << 1], &rc = tr[u << 1 | 1];    lc.val += rt.add; rc.val += rt.add;    lc.M -= 2 * rt.add; rc.M -= 2 * rt.add;    lc.LM -= rt.add; rc.LM -= rt.add;    lc.MR -= rt.add; rc.MR -= rt.add;    lc.add += rt.add; rc.add += rt.add;    rt.add = 0;}void build(int u, int l, int r) {    tr[u] = {l, r, -inf, -inf, -inf, -inf, -inf};    if (l == r) {        int x = which[r];        tr[u] = {l, r, d[x], -2 * d[x], -d[x], -d[x]};    } else {        int mid = l + r >> 1;        build(u << 1, l, mid);        build(u << 1 | 1, mid + 1, r);        pushup(u);    }}void modify(int u, int l, int r, int k) {    if (tr[u].l > r || tr[u].r < l) return;    if (tr[u].l >= l && tr[u].r <= r) {        tr[u].add += k;        tr[u].val += k; tr[u].M -= 2 * k;        tr[u].LM -= k; tr[u].MR -= k;    } else {        pushdown(u);        modify(u << 1, l, r, k);        modify(u << 1 | 1, l, r, k);        pushup(u);    }}void adde(int a, int b, int c) {    e[++idx] = b, w[idx] = c, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx; }void dfs(int u, int fa, int s) {    which[fi[u] = ++tot] = u;    d[u] = s;    f[u] = fa;    for (int i = h[u]; i; i = ne[i]) {        int j = e[i];        if (j == fa) continue;        weight[j] = w[i];        dfs(j, u, s + w[i]);        which[++tot] = u;    }    la[u] = tot;}signed main() {    int n, q, W;    scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &n, &q, &W);    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {        int a, b, c;        scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &a, &b, &c);        adde(a, b, c), adde(b, a, c);    }    dfs(1, 1, 0);    build(1, 1, tot);    int res = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {        int x, y;        scanf("%lld%lld", &x, &y);        x = (x + res) % (n - 1) + 1;        y = (y + res) % W;        if(f[e[x << 1]] == e[x << 1 | 1]) x = e[x << 1];        else x = e[x << 1 | 1];        modify(1, fi[x], la[x], y - weight[x]);        weight[x] = y;        res = tr[1].LMR;        printf("%lld\n", res);     }    return 0;}

可持久化字典树

AcWing256.最大异或和

有历史版本的字典树，可进行区间查询操作

#include <iostream>#include <cmath>using namespace std;const int N = 6e5 + 5, M = N * 24;int s[N], root[N], tr[M][2], maxid[M], idx;void insert(int i, int k, int lst, int u) {    if (k < 0) {        maxid[u] = i;        return;    }    int v = s[i] >> k & 1;    if (lst) tr[u][v ^ 1] = tr[lst][v ^ 1];    tr[u][v] = ++idx;    insert(i, k - 1, tr[lst][v], tr[u][v]);    maxid[u] = max(maxid[tr[u][0]], maxid[tr[u][1]]);}int query(int u, int C, int L) {    for (int i = 23; i >= 0; i--) {        int v = C >> i & 1;        if (maxid[tr[u][v ^ 1]] >= L) u = tr[u][v ^ 1];        else u = tr[u][v];    }    return s[maxid[u]] ^ C;}int main() {    int n, m;    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    maxid[0] = -1;    root[0] = ++idx;    insert(0, 23, 0, root[0]);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        int x;        scanf("%d", &x);        s[i] = s[i - 1] ^ x;        root[i] = ++idx;        insert(i, 23, root[i - 1], root[i]);    }    char op[2];    int l, r, x;    while (m--) {        scanf("%s", op);        if (*op == 'A') {            scanf("%d", &x);            n++;            s[n] = s[n - 1] ^ x;            root[n] = ++idx;            insert(n, 23, root[n - 1], root[n]);            } else {              scanf("%d%d%d", &l, &r, &x);            printf("%d\n", query(root[r - 1], s[n] ^ x, l - 1));        }        }    return 0;}

可持久化线段树（主席树）

AcWing255.第K小数

可查询区间第k小
一开始就把树建出来的写法

#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5;struct Node {    int l, r, cnt;}tr[N * 4 + N * 17];int root[N], idx;int n, m;vector<int> v;int a[N];int build(int l, int r) {    int u = ++idx;    if (l == r) return u;    int mid = l + r >> 1;    tr[u].l = build(l, mid), tr[u].r = build(mid + 1, r);    return u; }int insert(int lst, int l, int r, int x) {    int u = ++idx;    tr[u] = tr[lst];    if (l == r) {        tr[u].cnt++;        return u;    }    int mid = l + r >> 1;    if (x <= mid) tr[u].l = insert(tr[lst].l, l, mid, x);    else tr[u].r = insert(tr[lst].r, mid + 1, r, x);    tr[u].cnt = tr[tr[u].l].cnt + tr[tr[u].r].cnt;    return u;}int query(int u, int lst, int l, int r, int k) {    if (l == r) return r;    int cnt = tr[tr[u].l].cnt - tr[tr[lst].l].cnt;    int mid = l + r >> 1;    if (k <= cnt) return query(tr[u].l, tr[lst].l, l, mid, k);    else return query(tr[u].r, tr[lst].r, mid + 1, r, k - cnt);}int find(int x) {    return lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), x) - v.begin();}int main() {    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        scanf("%d", &a[i]);        v.push_back(a[i]);    }    sort(v.begin(), v.end());    v.erase(unique(v.begin(), v.end()), v.end());    root[0] = build(0, v.size() - 1);     for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        root[i] = insert(root[i - 1], 0, v.size() - 1, find(a[i]));    }    while (m--) {        int l, r, k;        scanf("%d%d%d", &l, &r, &k);        printf("%d\n", v[query(root[r], root[l - 1], 0, v.size() - 1, k)]);    }    return 0;}

2021ICPC昆明M.Stone Games

可查询区间比一个数小的数的和
动态开点的写法

#include <iostream>using namespace std;#define int long long const int N = 1e6 + 5;const int MAX = 1e9;struct Node {    int l, r, cnt;}tr[N * 50];int root[N], idx;int insert(int lst, int l, int r, int x) {    int u = ++idx;    tr[u] = tr[lst];    tr[u].cnt += x;     if (l == r) return u;    int mid = l + r >> 1;    if (x <= mid) tr[u].l = insert(tr[lst].l, l, mid, x);    else tr[u].r = insert(tr[lst].r, mid + 1, r, x);    return u;}int query(int u, int lst, int l, int r, int x) {    if (l == r) return tr[u].cnt - tr[lst].cnt;    int mid = l + r >> 1;    if (x <= mid) return query(tr[u].l, tr[lst].l, l, mid, x);    else return query(tr[u].r, tr[lst].r, mid + 1, r, x) + tr[tr[u].l].cnt - tr[tr[lst].l].cnt;}signed main() {    int n, Q;    scanf("%lld%lld", &n, &Q);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        int x;        scanf("%lld", &x);        root[i] = insert(root[i - 1], 1, MAX, x);    }    int ans = 0;    while (Q--) {        int l, r;        scanf("%lld%lld", &l, &r);        l = (l + ans) % n + 1, r = (r + ans) % n + 1;        if (l > r) swap(l, r);        int x = 1;        while (1) {            int s = query(root[r], root[l - 1], 1, MAX, x);            if (s == x - 1) break;            x = s + 1;        }        printf("%lld\n", ans = x);    }    return 0;}

平衡树

Splay

P3369 【模板】普通平衡树

插入x数
删除x数(若有多个相同的数，因只删除一个)
查询x数的排名(排名定义为比当前数小的数的个数+1)
查询排名为x的数
求x的前驱(前驱定义为小于 x，且最大的数)
求x的后继(后继定义为大于 x，且最小的数)

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;struct Node {    int s[2], val, fa, cnt, sz;    void init(int v, int f) {        s[0] = s[1] = 0;        val = v, fa = f, cnt = sz = 1;    }}tr[N];int root, idx;void pushup(int x) {    tr[x].sz = tr[tr[x].s[0]].sz + tr[tr[x].s[1]].sz + tr[x].cnt;}int get(int x) {    return x == tr[tr[x].fa].s[1];}void Rotate(int x) {    int y = tr[x].fa, z = tr[y].fa;    int k = get(x), sonx = tr[x].s[k ^ 1];    if (z) tr[z].s[get(y)] = x;    tr[y].s[k] = sonx;    if (sonx) tr[sonx].fa = y;    tr[x].s[k ^ 1] = y, tr[y].fa = x, tr[x].fa = z;    pushup(y), pushup(x);}void splay(int x, int k = 0) {    for (int y; y = tr[x].fa, y != k; Rotate(x)) {        if (tr[y].fa != k) Rotate(get(x) == get(y) ? y : x);    }    if (!k) root = x;}void ins(int k) {    int x = root, y = tr[x].fa;    while (x) {        if (tr[x].val == k) { tr[x].cnt++; splay(x); return; }        y = x;        x = tr[x].s[tr[x].val < k];    }    tr[++idx].init(k, y);    if (y) tr[y].s[tr[y].val < k] = idx;    splay(idx);}int rk(int k) {    int res = 0, x = root;    while (x) {        if (tr[x].val > k) x = tr[x].s[0];        else {            res += tr[tr[x].s[0]].sz;            if (tr[x].val == k) {                splay(x);                return res + 1;            }            res += tr[x].cnt;            x = tr[x].s[1];        }    }    return res + 1;}int kth(int k) {    int x = root;    while (x) {        if (tr[x].s[0] && tr[tr[x].s[0]].sz >= k) x = tr[x].s[0];        else {            k -= tr[tr[x].s[0]].sz + tr[x].cnt;            if (k <= 0) {                splay(x);                return tr[x].val;            }            x = tr[x].s[1];        }    }    return INF;}void del(int k) {    rk(k);    if (tr[root].cnt > 1) {        tr[root].cnt--; tr[root].sz--;        return;    }    if (!tr[root].s[0] || !tr[root].s[1]) {        root = tr[root].s[0] | tr[root].s[1];        if (root) tr[root].fa = 0;        return;    }    int x = tr[root].s[0];    while (tr[x].s[1]) x = tr[x].s[1];    splay(x);    tr[x].s[1] = tr[tr[x].s[1]].s[1];    tr[tr[x].s[1]].fa = x;    pushup(x);}int pre(int k) {    ins(k);    int x = tr[root].s[0];    if (x == 0) return -INF;    while (tr[x].s[1]) x = tr[x].s[1];    splay(x);    del(k);    return tr[x].val;}int nxt(int k) {    ins(k);    int x = tr[root].s[1];    if (x == 0) return INF;    while (tr[x].s[0]) x = tr[x].s[0];    splay(x);    del(k);    return tr[x].val;}int main() {    int n;    scanf("%d", &n);    for (int i = 0, opt, x; i < n; i++) {        scanf("%d%d", &opt, &x);        if (opt == 1) ins(x);        else if (opt == 2) del(x);        else if (opt == 3) printf("%d\n", rk(x));        else if (opt == 4) printf("%d\n", kth(x));        else if (opt == 5) printf("%d\n", pre(x));        else printf("%d\n", nxt(x));    }    return 0;}

P3391 【模板】文艺平衡树

splay旋转区间的应用

#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5;struct Node {    int s[2], v, fa, sz, lazy;    void init(int _v, int _fa) {        s[0] = s[1] = lazy = 0;        v = _v, fa = _fa, sz = 1;    }}tr[N];int root, idx;int n;void pushup(int x) {    tr[x].sz = tr[tr[x].s[0]].sz + tr[tr[x].s[1]].sz + 1;}void pushdown(int x) {    if (tr[x].lazy) {        swap(tr[x].s[0], tr[x].s[1]);        tr[tr[x].s[0]].lazy ^= 1;        tr[tr[x].s[1]].lazy ^= 1;        tr[x].lazy = 0;    }}int get(int x) {    return x == tr[tr[x].fa].s[1];}void Rotate(int x) {    int y = tr[x].fa, z = tr[y].fa;    int k = get(x), sonx = tr[x].s[k ^ 1];    if (z) tr[z].s[get(y)] = x;    tr[y].s[k] = sonx;    if (sonx) tr[sonx].fa = y;    tr[x].s[k ^ 1] = y, tr[y].fa = x, tr[x].fa = z;    pushup(y), pushup(x);}void splay(int x, int k) {    for (int y; y = tr[x].fa, y != k; Rotate(x)) {        if (tr[y].fa != k) Rotate(get(x) == get(y) ? y : x);    }    if (k == 0) root = x;}void ins(int k) {    int x = root, y = tr[x].fa;    while (x) { y = x, x = tr[x].s[tr[x].v < k]; }    tr[++idx].init(k, y);    if (y) tr[y].s[tr[y].v < k] = idx;    splay(idx, 0);}int kth(int k) {    int x = root;    while (x) {        pushdown(x);        if (tr[x].s[0] && tr[tr[x].s[0]].sz >= k) x = tr[x].s[0];        else {            k -= tr[tr[x].s[0]].sz + 1;            if (k <= 0) return x;            x = tr[x].s[1];        }    }    return -1;}void print(int u) {    pushdown(u);    if (tr[u].s[0]) print(tr[u].s[0]);    if (tr[u].v >= 1 && tr[u].v <= n) printf("%d ", tr[u].v);    if (tr[u].s[1]) print(tr[u].s[1]);}int main() {    int m;    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    for (int i = 0; i <= n + 1; i++) ins(i);    for (int i = 0, l, r; i < m; i++) {        scanf("%d%d", &l, &r);        l = kth(l), r = kth(r + 2);        splay(l, 0), splay(r, l);        tr[tr[r].s[0]].lazy ^= 1;    }    print(root);    return 0;}

分块

HDU4417 Super Mario

把序列分成sqrt(n) + 1块，每块的大小为sqrt(n), 处理区间问题，时间复杂度为nsqrt(n)

#include <iostream>#include <vector>#include <algorithm>#include <cmath>using namespace std;const int N = 1e5 + 5;int a[N];int block, cnt, belong[N];vector<int> v[N];int main() {    int T;    scanf("%d", &T);    for (int t = 1; t <= T; t++) {        int n, m;        scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);        block = sqrt(n);        cnt = block * block == n ? block : block + 1;        for (int i = 1; i <= cnt; i++) v[i].clear();        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {            scanf("%d", &a[i]);            belong[i] = (i - 1) / block + 1;            v[belong[i]].push_back(a[i]);        }        for (int i = 1; i <= cnt; i++) sort(v[i].begin(), v[i].end());        printf("Case %d:\n", t);        while (m--) {            int l, r, k;            scanf("%d%d%d", &l, &r, &k);            l++, r++;            int res = 0;            for (int i = l; i <= min(belong[l] * block , r); i++) {                if (a[i] <= k) res++;            }            if (belong[l] != belong[r]) {                for (int i = (belong[r] - 1) * block + 1; i <= r; i++) {                    if (a[i] <= k) res++;                }            }            for (int i = belong[l] + 1; i < belong[r]; i++) {                int t = upper_bound(v[i].begin(), v[i].end(), k) - v[i].begin();                res += t;            }            printf("%d\n", res);        }    }    return 0;}

第四章 图论

树上问题

树的直径

树的重心

AcWing846.树的重心

重心定义：重心是指树中的一个结点，如果将这个点删除后，剩余各个连通块中点数的最大值最小，那么这个节点被称为树的重心。

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 100010, M = N * 2;int h[N], e[M], ne[M], idx;bool st[N];int n, ans = N;void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}int get_wc(int u, int fa, int tot, int &wc) {    if (st[u]) return 0;    int sum = 1, ms = 0;    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {        int j = e[i];        if (j == fa) continue;        int t = get_wc(j, u, tot, wc);        ms = max(ms, t);        sum += t;    }    ms = max(ms, tot - sum);    ans = min(ans, ms);    if (ms <= tot / 2) wc = u;    return sum;}int main() {    scanf("%d", &n);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {        int a, b;        scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);        add(a, b), add(b, a);    }    int wc;    get_wc(1, 1, n, wc);    printf("%d\n", ans);    return 0;}

最近公共祖先

AcWing1172.祖孙询问

使用倍增法找最近公共祖先

#include <iostream>#include <cstring> #include <vector>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 4e4 + 5;vector<int> G[N];int d[N], f[N][16];void bfs(int root) {    memset(d, 0x3f, sizeof d);    queue<int> q;    q.push(root);    d[0] = 0;    d[root] = 1;    while (q.size()) {        int u = q.front();        q.pop();        for (auto v : G[u]) {            if (d[v] > d[u] + 1) {                d[v] = d[u] + 1;                q.push(v);                f[v][0] = u;                for (int i = 1; i <= 15; i++) {                    f[v][i] = f[f[v][i - 1]][i - 1];                }            }                    }    }}int lca(int u, int v) {    if (d[u] < d[v]) swap(u, v);    for (int i = 15; i >= 0; i--) {        if (d[f[u][i]] >= d[v]) {            u = f[u][i];        }    }    if (u == v) return u;    for (int i = 15; i >= 0; i--) {        if (f[u][i] != f[v][i]) {            u = f[u][i];            v = f[v][i];        }    }    return f[u][0];}int main() {    int n, m;    scanf("%d", &n);    int root;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        int u, v;        scanf("%d%d", &u, &v);        if (v == -1) root = u;        else G[u].push_back(v), G[v].push_back(u);    }    bfs(root);    scanf("%d", &m);    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int u, v;        scanf("%d%d", &u, &v);        int p = lca(u, v);        if (p == u) puts("1");        else if (p == v) puts("2");        else puts("0");    }    return 0;}

拓扑序列

AcWing848.有向图的拓扑序列

若一个由图中所有点构成的序列A满足：对于图中的每条边(x,y)，x在A中都出现在y之前，则称A是该图的一个拓扑序列。

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 100010;int h[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;int q[N], d[N];int hh = 0, tt = 0;int n, m;void add(int a, int b) {    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}bool topsort() {    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        if (d[i] == 0) q[tt++] = i;    }    while (hh < tt) {        int u = q[hh++];        for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {            int j = e[i];            if (d[j]) {                d[j]--;                if (d[j] == 0) q[tt++] = j;            }        }    }    return  tt == n;}int main() {    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i =  0; i < m; i++) {        int a, b;        scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);        add(a, b);        d[b]++;    }    if(topsort()) for (int i = 0; i < tt; i++) printf("%d ", q[i]);    else puts("-1");    return 0;}

最大团

HDU1530 Maximum Clique

图的最大完全子图

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 55, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;int G[N][N];int st[N];int n, res;void dfs(int u, int cnt) {    res = max(res, cnt);    if (u > n) return;    bool flag = true;    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        if (st[i] && G[u][i] == 0) {            flag = false;            break;        }    }    if (flag) {        st[u] = true;        dfs(u + 1, cnt + 1);        st[u] = false;    }    if (n - u + cnt > res) dfs(u + 1, cnt);}int main() {    while (scanf("%d", &n)) {        if (n == 0) break;        res = -INF;        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {            st[i] = false;            for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) scanf("%d", &G[i][j]);        }        dfs(1, 0);        printf("%d\n", res);    }    return 0;}

最短路

Dijkstra

普通Dijkstra算法

AcWing849.Dijkstra求最短路I

用邻接矩阵存图，点少和是稠密图的时候使用

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 510;int g[N][N];int dist[N];bool st[N];int n, m;int dijkstra() {    memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof dist);    dist[1] = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {        int t = -1;        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            if (!st[j] && (t == -1 || dist[j] < dist[t])) t = j;        }        st[t] = true;        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            dist[j] = min(dist[j], dist[t] + g[t][j]);        }    }    return dist[n] == 0x3f3f3f3f ? -1 : dist[n];}int main() {    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    memset(g, 0x3f, sizeof g);    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int x, y, z;        scanf("%d%d%d", &x, &y, &z);        g[x][y] = min(g[x][y], z);    }    printf("%d\n", dijkstra());    return 0;}

堆优化版Dijkstra算法

AcWing850.Dijkstra求最短路II

用邻接表存图，点多和稀疏图的时候使用

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 150010;typedef pair<int, int> pii;#define x first#define y secondint n, m;int h[N], w[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;int dist[N];bool st[N];void add(int a, int b, int c) {    e[idx] = b, w[idx] = c, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}int dijkstra() {    memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof dist);    dist[1] = 0;    priority_queue<pii, vector<pii>, greater<pii>> heap;    heap.push({0, 1});    while (heap.size()) {        pii t = heap.top();        heap.pop();        if (st[t.y]) continue;        st[t.y] = true;        for (int i = h[t.y]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {            int j = e[i];            if (dist[j] > t.x + w[i]) {                dist[j] = t.x + w[i];                heap.push({dist[j], j});            }        }    }    return dist[n] == 0x3f3f3f3f ? -1 : dist[n];}int main() {    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int a, b, c;        scanf("%d%d%d", &a, &b, &c);        add(a, b, c);    }    printf("%d\n", dijkstra());    return 0;}

bellman-ford

AcWing853.有边数限制的最短路

用于有边数限制的最短路

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 510;const int M = 10010;struct Edge {    int a, b, c;}edges[M];int n, m, k;int dist[N], backup[N];int Bellman_Ford() {    memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof dist);    dist[1] = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < k; i++) {        memcpy(backup, dist, sizeof dist);        for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) {            Edge t = edges[j];            dist[t.b] = min(dist[t.b], backup[t.a] + t.c);         }    }    return dist[n] > 0x3f3f3f3f / 2 ? -1 : dist[n];}int main() {    scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &k);    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int a, b, c;        scanf("%d%d%d", &a, &b, &c);        edges[i] = {a, b, c};    }    int t = Bellman_Ford();    if (t == -1) puts("impossible");    else printf("%d\n", t);    return 0;}

spfa

AcWing851.spfa求最短路

bellman-ford算法的优化，可用于判断是否存在负环，记录每个点被进行松弛操作的次数，大于等于n时存在。

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>#include <queue>using namespace std;const int N = 100010;int h[N], w[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;int n, m;int dist[N];bool st[N];void add(int a, int b, int c) {    e[idx] = b, w[idx] = c, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}int spfa() {    memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof dist);    dist[1] = 0;    queue<int> q;    q.push(1);    st[1] = true;    while (q.size()) {        int u = q.front();        q.pop();        st[u] = false;        for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {            int j = e[i];            if (dist[j] > dist[u] + w[i]) {                dist[j] = dist[u] + w[i];                if (!st[j]) {                    q.push(j);                    st[j] = true;                }            }        }    }    return dist[n] == 0x3f3f3f3f ? -1 : dist[n];}int main() {    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);    while (m--) {        int a, b, c;        scanf("%d%d%d", &a, &b, &c);        add(a, b, c);    }    int ans = spfa();    if (ans == -1)  puts("impossible");    else printf("%d\n", ans);    return 0;}

Floyd

AcWing854.Floyd求最短路

点少的时候的求最短路的最佳方案

#include <iostream>using namespace std;const int N = 210;const int INF = 1e9;int g[N][N];int n, m, Q;void floyd() {    for (int k = 1; k <= n; k++) {        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {            for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {                g[i][j] =  min(g[i][j], g[i][k] + g[k][j]);            }        }    }}int main() {    scanf("%d%d%d", &n, &m, &Q);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            if (i != j) g[i][j] = INF;        }    }    while (m--) {        int a, b, c;        scanf("%d%d%d", &a, &b, &c);        g[a][b] = min(g[a][b], c);    }    floyd();    while (Q--) {        int a, b;        scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);        if (g[a][b] > INF / 2) puts("impossible");        else printf("%d\n", g[a][b]);    }    return 0;}

最小生成树

Prim

AcWing858.Prim算法求最小生成树

从一个点出发不断加点

#include <iostream>#include <cstring>using namespace std;const int N = 510, INF = 0x3f3f3f3f;int g[N][N];int dist[N];bool st[N];int n, m;int prim() {    memset(dist, 0x3f, sizeof dist);    int res = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {        int t = -1;        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            if (!st[j] && (t == -1 || dist[j] < dist[t])) t = j;        }        if (i && dist[t] == INF) return INF;        if (i) res += dist[t];        for (int j = 1; j <= n; j++) {            dist[j] = min(dist[j], g[t][j]);        }        st[t] = true;    }    return res;}int main() {    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    memset(g, 0x3f, sizeof g);    while (m--) {        int a, b, c;        scanf("%d%d%d", &a, &b, &c);        g[a][b] = g[b][a] = min(g[a][b], c);    }        int t = prim();    if (t == INF) puts("impossible");    else printf("%d\n", t);    return 0;}

Kruskal

AcWing859.Kruskal算法求最小生成树

边从小到大排序后依次加边，最小生成树最常用算法

#include <iostream>#include <algorithm>using namespace std;const int N = 200010;int n, m;struct Edge {    int a, b, w;    bool operator<(const Edge &x) const {        return w < x.w;    }}edges[N];int p[N];int find(int x) {    return x == p[x] ? x : p[x] = find(p[x]); }int main() {    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int a, b, c;        scanf("%d%d%d", &a, &b, &c);        edges[i] = {a, b, c};    }    sort(edges, edges + m);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) p[i] = i;    int res = 0, cnt = 0;    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {        int a = edges[i].a;        int b = edges[i].b;        a = find(a), b = find(b);        if (a != b) {            cnt++;            p[a] = b;            res += edges[i].w;        }    }    if (cnt < n - 1) puts("impossible");    else printf("%d\n", res);    return 0;}

ZOJ2770 Burn the Linked Camp

根据约束条件建边跑spfa

#include <iostream>#include <queue>using namespace std;#define int long long const int N = 1e3 + 5, M = 2e4 + 5;const int INF = 1e18;int h[N], e[M], w[M], ne[M], idx;int s[N], cnt[N], n, m;bool st[N];void add(int a, int b, int c) {    e[idx] = b, w[idx] = c, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;}bool spfa() {    queue<int> q;    s[n + 1] = 0;    q.push(n + 1);    st[n + 1] = true;    while (q.size()) {        int u = q.front(); q.pop();        st[u] = false;        for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {            int v = e[i];            if (s[v] > s[u] + w[i]) {                s[v] = s[u] + w[i];                if (st[v] == 0) {                    st[v] = true;                    cnt[v]++;                    if (cnt[v] >= n) return false;                    q.push(v);                }            }        }    }    return s[n] != INF;}signed main() {    while (~scanf("%lld%lld", &n, &m)) {        idx = 0;        for (int i = 0; i <= n + 1; i++) {            h[i] = -1; s[i] = INF;             cnt[i] = st[i] = 0;        }        add(n + 1, 0, 0);        for (int i = 1, c; i <= n; i++) {            scanf("%lld", &c);            add(i - 1, i, c);            add(i, i - 1, 0);            add(n + 1, i, 0);        }        for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {            int a, b, k;            scanf("%lld%lld%lld", &a, &b, &k);            add(b, a - 1, -k);        }        if (spfa()) printf("%lld\n", s[n] - s[0]);        else puts("Bad Estimations");    }    return 0;}

图的连通

有向图的强连通分量

AcWing1174.受欢迎的牛

tarjan模板题

  1. 加时间戳；
  2. 放入栈中，做好标记；
  3. 遍历邻点
    1）如果没遍历过，tarjan一遍，用low[j]更新最小值low
    1. 如果在栈中，用dfn[j]更新最小值low
  4. 找到最高点
    1）scc个数++
    2）do-while循环：
    从栈中取出每个元素；标志为出栈；对元素做好属于哪个scc；该scc中点的数量++
#include <iostream>#include <vector>using namespace std;const int N = 1e4 + 5;vector<int> G[N];int dfs[N], low[N], idx;int scc[N], sz[N], sc;int stk[N], top;bool in_stk[N];void Tarjan(int u) {    dfs[u] = low[u] = ++idx;    stk[++top] = u, in_stk[u] = true;    for (auto v : G[u]) {        if (!dfs[v]) {            Tarjan(v);            low[u] = min(low[u], low[v]);        } else if (in_stk[v]) {            low[u] = min(low[u], dfs[v]);        }    }    if (dfs[u] == low[u]) {        sc++;        int tp;        do {            tp = stk[top--];            in_stk[tp] = false;            scc[tp] = sc;            sz[sc]++;        }while(tp != u);    }}int main() {    int n, m;    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);    for (int i = 0, u, v; i < m; i++) {        scanf("%d%d", &u, &v);        G[u].push_back(v);    }    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        if (!dfs[i]) Tarjan(i);    }    vector<int> d(n + 1);    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {        for (auto j : G[i]) {            int a = scc[i], b = scc[j];            if (a != b) d[a]++;        }    }    int cnt = 0, res = 0;    for (int i = 1; i <= sc; i++) {        if (!d[i]) {            cnt++;            res += sz[i];            if (cnt > 1) { res = 0; break; }        }    }    printf("%d\n", res);    return 0;}
